name: S.W.A.R.M.
description:
!!!Attention, please download the Windows build in order to use leaderboard features:) !!!

Please read how to play first. As of 5/11/20 there is no title screen lmao.

Made for the ScoreSpace x 8 Bits to Infinity ~ Arcade Controls Jam in 72 hours!

3D modeling, images, coding, sound effects - simon

main song - michael

HOW TO PLAY:

Pilot your SWARM over the oil spills and rescue the matinees !

WASD to pilot swarm/move claw underwater

SPACE to drop claw into water or drop claw onto manatee

The ball surrounding the SWARM points you to the nearest oil spill.

Catch 3 manatees in a row to increase your modifier

Manatees by difficulty (and amount of points you get from catching them!)

easy <-- green, yellow, red, purple --> hard

SWARM
  • Special
  • Water
  • Animal
  • Retrieval
  • Machine

Pilot your SWARM around the map, saving as many manatees as you can in 60 seconds. Enter your high score at the end to get to the top of the leader boards!
